<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Nonlethal Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=1835) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Metamagic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=107" />
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=166" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 142 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can alter offensive spells to be less deadly. If your next action is to Cast a Spell that deals damage and doesn't have the [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) or [negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118) trait, that spell gains the [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) trait.
name: Nonlethal Spell
